name: train production, passenger, long-distance | train, passenger, long-distance | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8186/documentation

Based on "train production, passenger, long-distance, CH 2000". The exchanges of the train manufacturing are derived from an assessment of the "IC 2000", a long-distance train which is currently used for long distance transportation in Switzerland .The life span of the train  is assumed to be 40 years resulting in a life time performance of  20’000’000 vkm. The dominating material is alluminium to reduce the weight and hence energy consumption in operation.

Service starts with the material consumption for the production of the long-distance train.

This inventory calls processes of material production, representing the material composition of a standard Swiss Long-Distance Train (IC 2000) For manufacturing, electricity and light oil burned in industrial furnace are included. For the transportation of materials standard distance are applied. The disposal of the long-distance train is included as well.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/302:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock/3020:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Extrapolated from "train production, passenger, long-distance, CH 2000". Manufacturing data represents a train produced in Europe.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: In 2000 the modelled train represents the state of the art of long distance transport in Switzerland.  In the near future the share of this train type on the total long distance transport will be increased. ;References:;Frischknecht R., Bollens U., Bosshart S., Ciot M., Ciseri L., Doka G., Dones R., Gantner U. and Hischier R. (1996) Ökoinventare von Energiesystemen: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Energiesystemen und den Einbezug von Energiesystemen in Ökobilanzen für die Schweiz. Auflage No. 3. Gruppe Energie - Stoffe - Umwelt (ESU), Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule Zuerich und Sektion Ganzheitliche Systemanalysen, Paul Scherrer Institut, Villigen, Bundesamt für Energie (Hrsg.), Bern ;Maibach M., Peter D. and Seiler B. (1999) Ökoinventar Transporte: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Transportsystemen und den Einbezug von Transportsystemen in Ökobilanzen. Technischer Schlussbericht. In: Schweizerischer Nationalfonds zur Förderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (ed. SPP Umwelt M.). 2nd Edition. INFRAS, Zürich
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This train type is used as an estimate for the entire long-distance train fleet. This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data of the material composition and energy consumption is based on  literature studies.
